first_dialog:
Oh, hey there kiddo, do you need anything? Also, can this be quick, you're kind of blocking the football game.
(You can decide what type of football he's watching.)
Son, those are a lot of words that I don't understand.
Champ, the answer is no. We're not going to buy every new console that comes out. Besides, we just got you a game for your birthday, maybe wait until next year.
Okay, this is getting annoying. Back in my day if I wanted something I had to work for it and earn every cent. I used to mow lawns, maybe Neighbor Bob needs his grass cut today.
Anyway, consider spending some time outdoors instead of playing video games all day. It builds character. Maybe even give the lawn mowing idea shot.
player_dialog: Did you hear, the Swapdeck 2 just came out!
It has 12 GB of RAM and can run 4K games at 60 FPS!
It's a huge step up from the previous generation!
possible_dialog: *He's too busy watching the football game.*
